meanings.definition: A plant of the primrose family, typically having pale yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the primroses bloomed beautifully under the sun.
meanings.sent2: She picked a bouquet of primroses to brighten up the room.
meanings.sent3: The primroses whispered secrets to the daisies in the flower bed.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as delicate and lovely as a cluster of primroses.
meanings.sent5: The scent of primroses filled the air, bringing a sense of tranquility.

meanings.sent1: The artist used primroses to paint a soft, pastel landscape.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a lovely shade of primroses, matching the spring flowers.
meanings.sent3: The primroses of the sunset painted the sky in hues of gold and pink.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was as warm and bright as the primroses in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The primroses of dawn heralded the start of a new day with their gentle glow.
